mapper.select: SELECT print.id, print_date, username, print_behavior.behavior as behavior_name, goods_id FROM print inner join print_behavior where print.behavior = print_behavior.id ORDER BY print_date DESC;

SELECT print.id, print.print_date, print.username, print_behavior.behavior as behavior_name, print.goods_id FROM print inner join print_behavior where print.behavior = print_behavior.id
AND
username LIKE concat('%',#{item},'%')
OR
goods_id LIKE concat('%',#{item},'%')
OR
print_behavior.behavior LIKE concat('%',#{item},'%')
ORDER BY print.print_date DESC;
mapper.insert: insert into print (print_date, username, behavior, goods_id) values (#{print_date}, #{username}, #{behavior}, #{goods_id});
